wordGroup: graveyard shift 夜班；全体夜班的工人

sentences.en: Detectives are still searching for those who violated the graveyard.
sentences.cn: 侦探们还在查找那些亵渎了墓地的家伙。

sentences.en: They made their way to a graveyard to pay their traditional respects to the dead.
sentences.cn: 他们一路前行来到墓地，以传统的方式祭奠死者。

sentences.en: All the town was drifting toward the graveyard.
